content.raw: I suggest having a table of implemented `Features` instead of `FeatureLists` since we don't have standard FeatureLists yet. Also, I think it would be easier to read if this table had three columns as the previous (Entity Comparison) table and we used a check mark (✓) and a blank or a ✕ in each row. This would be similar to the [feature comparison](https://ignitionrobotics.org/docs/blueprint/comparison) between ign-gazebo and gazebo classic.
content.html: I suggest having a table of implemented Features instead of FeatureLists since we don't have standard FeatureLists yet. Also, I think it would be easier to read if this table had three columns as the previous (Entity Comparison) table and we used a check mark (✓) and a blank or a ✕ in each row. This would be similar to the feature comparison between ign-gazebo and gazebo classic.
